# Introduction

```{r, echo=FALSE}
## Initialisation
list.of.packages <- c("ggplot2", "readr", "dplyr")
new.packages <- list.of.packages[!(list.of.packages %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"])]
if(length(new.packages)) install.packages(new.packages)

library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
source("../../../graphs/theme_custom.R")
```
